headline: A genie appears. What do you wish for?
description:
My wish is to learn about your wishes. No meta conversation about the scenario, no judgement of others wishes. Just self-revelation about preferences and maybe your past life experiences that led to those preferences.

I posted my wishes in the comments as well.

-----

[Guidelines]

I kindly ask you to respect the following guidelines if you want to participate in the conversation:

- Top-level answers/comments should always include the personal preferences and self-revelation of the commenter.

- If you have a strong desire for meta comments/questions that are not about stating your preferences, please add them to the [META] comment

- When reading don't judge others for their preferences. If you don't understand why they choose a certain thing, you are invited to ask them while keeping an open mind. Then you might be able to listen to their reasons and hear about their past life experiences that guided them towards their current preferences.

- Enjoy the conversation.
